title: Embedded Systems Design
description: Processors, chipsets, busses, and I/O devices for high-ended embedded systems. Embedded operating systems; device drivers and applications for embedded systems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or ((CS 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or CS 3240 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
